board-name.title: Board name
board-name.desc: The board's title. This will be visible in the title bar and in the breadcrumbs.

board-title.title: Header HTML
board-title.desc: The board's header, which is usually an image. Clicking on it will redirect to the index.

title-submessage.title: Staff submessage
title-submessage.desc: Staff-only message shown below the board header.

board-url.title: Header link
board-url.desc: Path to the board without the last backslash. The origin check depends on this.

footer-title.title: Footer text
footer-title.desc: This will be shown above the footer. Should describe what it links to (see below).

footer-url.title: Footer link
footer-url.desc: The URL linked by the footer text. Usually it directs to the root page on the website.

footer-extra.title: Extra footer HTML
footer-extra.desc: Additional HTML to display below the footer text.

admin-name.title: Admin name
admin-name.desc: The board owner's email, which appears in the IP ban message.

admin-email.title: Support email
admin-email.desc: Support email, shown to IP banned users.

enable-christmas.title: Enable Christmas override
enable-christmas.desc: If enabled, the Christmas theme will be forced in December.

affiliate-links.title: Affiliates (HTML)
affiliate-links.desc: HTML option tags for the affiliate box, which is shown in the footer. If blank, the box will be hidden.
affiliate-links.default:
<optgroup label="Forum affiliates">
	<option value="about:blank" selected="">something</option>
</optgroup>
<optgroup label="Other Acmlmboards">
	<option value="about:blank">just so you know</option>
	<option value="about:blank">usually there are</option>
	<option value="about:blank">no affiliates</option>
	<option value="about:blank">so you can remove this</option>
</optgroup>

money-stats.title: Show money stats
money-stats.desc: If enabled, bars with money info will be shown on the footer, displaying values that can be edited from the Admin Control Panel.

allow-thread-deletion.title: Allow thread deletion
allow-thread-deletion.desc: Allows super-admins to permanently delete threads (old-style deletion). Recommended to keep disabled.

allow-post-deletion.title: Allow post deletion
allow-post-deletion.desc: Allows super-admins to permanently delete posts (old-style deletion). Recommended to keep disabled.

enable-ratings.title: Enable user ratings
enable-ratings.desc: Enables users to rate others from a scale of 0 to 10. The vote's weight increases with the user's level.

onlineusers-on-thread.title: Online users bar detail
onlineusers-on-thread.desc: Determines what to show in the online users bar when viewing a thread. If set to 'Thread', it will show users reading the thread (AB2.064 behaviour), otherwise it will show all users in the forum (original behaviour, as shown in the forum page).

allow-pmthread-edit.title: Allow PM editing
allow-pmthread-edit.desc: Allows normal users to edit or delete their posts in private conversations. By default, only admins are allowed to do so.

pmthread-dest-limit.title: Max partecipants/conv.
pmthread-dest-limit.desc: Limits the amount of the partecipants in a PM conversation. This does not include the user who starts the conversation. Enter 0 to disable this limit.

pmthread-folder-limit.title: Max PM folders/user
pmthread-folder-limit.desc: Limits the amount of custom folders for private conversations an user can create. Enter 0 to disable.

view-super-minpower.title: Powerlevel required to view Normal+ users
view-super-minpower.desc: Mostly an holdover from the original Jul code, where only Normal+ users or above can see who is part of the group. Can be set to the lowest level if this group is used for other purposes (ie: 'Local Moderator', 'Developer')

active-threads-index.title: Show active threads
active-threads-index.desc: Displays a list of 'Recently active threads' on the index page.

post-highlight-index-days.title: Featured post lifetime
post-highlight-index-days.desc: Posts featured within the specified amount of days will be listed on the index page. Set to 0 to not show anything on the index.

post-highlight-index-limit.title: Featured post limit
post-highlight-index-limit.desc: Caps how many featured posts can be listed on the index page.

post-highlight-super-minpower.title: Powerlevel required to feature posts
post-highlight-super-minpower.desc: Minimum power required to feature posts, which can be visible on the index page and as its own archive.

allow-attachments.title: Enable attachments
allow-attachments.desc: Allows users to upload attachments to posts and private messages.

attachments-all-origin.title: Allow global hotlinking
attachments-all-origin.desc: This allows hotlinking attachments from outside the board. If disabled, hotlinking will be only allowed from inside the board.

hide-attachments.title: Hide attachments
hide-attachments.desc: When attachments are disabled, this determines whether to show any existing attachments or not. This only hides them from threads, but does NOT prevent access to them.

attach-max-size.title: Max attachment size
attach-max-size.desc: Limits the total size for the attachments assigned to a single post.

allow-avatar-storage.title: Enable avatar upload
allow-avatar-storage.desc: Enables avatars to be stored locally. This also allows users to define a custom amount of avatars. If disabled, the original avatar system will be used and the following options will have no effect.

avatar-limit.title: Avatar limit/user
avatar-limit.desc: Limits the amount of avatars each user can define. Enter 0 to disable this limit.

max-minipic-size-x.title: Minipic max width
max-minipic-size-x.desc: Maximum width for the small picture which appears next to the user's name.

max-minipic-size-y.title: Minipic max height
max-minipic-size-y.desc: Maximum height for the small picture which appears next to the user's name.

max-minipic-size-bytes.title: Max minipic size
max-minipic-size-bytes.desc: Maximum allowed file size for uploaded minipics.

max-avatar-size-x.title: Max avatar width
max-avatar-size-x.desc: Maximum width for user avatars, which are shown in post sidebars.

max-avatar-size-y.title: Max avatar height
max-avatar-size-y.desc: Maximum height for user avatars, which are shown in post sidebars.

max-avatar-size-bytes.title: Max avatar size
max-avatar-size-bytes.desc: Maximum allowed file size for uploaded avatars.

timezone.title: Time zone
timezone.desc: If specified, allows to override PHP's default time zone. See here for the allowed values. Only useful if the board is moved to a server in a different time zone.

default-dateformat.title: Default date format
default-dateformat.desc: Change how dates are displayed. Uses date() formatting.

default-dateshort.title: Default short date format
default-dateshort.desc: Change how abbreviated dates are displayed. Uses the same formatting.

default-ppp.title: Default posts per page
default-ppp.desc: The default maximum number of posts you want to be shown in a page in threads.

default-tpp.title: Default threads per page
default-tpp.desc: The default maximum number of threads you want to be shown in a page in forums.

salt-string.title: Salt string
salt-string.desc: Primary salt text for CSRF tokens. Write anything you like as you shouldn't remember this.

force-lastip-match.title: Force /32 IP verification
force-lastip-match.desc: Forces a log out whenever any part of the IP changes, and removes the other IP verification options at login. This is similar behaviour to BoardC.

no-curl.title: Bypass proxy checks
no-curl.desc: Disables the proxy check during registration. This should be set to 'Yes' if the board is being run on a free host, as it most likely restricts access to the functions used for this.

log-referers.title: Log external referers
log-referers.desc: Logs the referer URLs that don't come from the same origin as the board. There's no interface to view them, but they get logged to the 'referer' table.

log-useragents.title: Log user agents
log-useragents.desc: Logs the user agent history for the logged in users.

log-rendertime.title: Log render times
log-rendertime.desc: Logs the rendering times for the index page and a few others. They can be viewed through the "ext/rendertime*.php" scripts.

irc-server-title.title: IRC Server title
irc-server-title.desc: Shown in the title of the IRC section.

irc-servers.title: IRC Servers
irc-servers.desc: List of selectable servers in the IRC section. Separated by ;

irc-channels.title: IRC channel list
irc-channels.desc: Channels to auto-join when connecting to IRC. Separated by ;

discord-guild-title.title: Discord guild title
discord-guild-title.desc: Shown in the title of the Discord section.

discord-invites.title: Discord invites
discord-invites.desc: Invites (optionally to specific channels) selectable in the chat page, one for each line.

trash-forum.title: Trash forum ID
trash-forum.desc: Trashing threads will move them to this forum. Generally this shouldn't be changed.

announcement-forum.title: Announcement forum ID
announcement-forum.desc: The announcements list will look for threads in this forum. Generally this shouldn't be changed.

deleted-user-id.title: Deleted user ID
deleted-user-id.desc: When an user is deleted all posts/PMs/etc will be reassigned to this user. Generally this shouldn't be changed.

backup-folder.title: Backup folder
backup-folder.desc: Backups created with the backup utility will be stored here. Change it if you want to specify a different folder. Note the folder has to exist and it's recommended to not be accessible by users.

backup-threshold.title: Backup "New" threshold
backup-threshold.desc: Days until a backup is considered to be "old".

always-show-debug.title: Always enable debuggers
always-show-debug.desc: Enables debug mode and the SQL debugger to all users.

sqldebuggers.title: SQL Debuggers
sqldebuggers.desc: List of IP addresses allowed to use the SQL debugger, when the global debugging option is disabled. Separated by ;

allow-debug-dump.title: Allow mysqldump
allow-debug-dump.desc: If enabled, allows usage of the dbdump tool to quickly download the SQL dump of the entire database. Note the "ext/dbdump.php" script needs to point to the mysqldump program to work.

force-user-id.title: Force user ID
force-user-id.desc: The logged in user will always be this. Enter 0 to disable.

allow-rereggie.title: Allow re-registrations
allow-rereggie.desc: Allow non-admins to re-register multiple accounts.<!-- if you enable this to accomodate certain users you're a damn dumbass. do not ever enable this outside of testboards -->

compat-test.title: Enable compatibility layer
compat-test.desc: Some level of support for older pages. Not necessary for normal use.

comments.title: Always show HTML comments
comments.desc: If enabled here, HTML comments will be always shown. If not, they will be enabled only with the proper equipment.

noposts.title: Hide postcounts (partially)
noposts.desc: This functionality was partially broken and it isn't yet fixed.

password_compatibility.title: Auto-convert MD5 password
password_compatibility.desc: Holdover from the original Jul code for converting passwords to the new system. Partially disabled.

host.title: Alternate board mode
host.desc: Holdover from Jul's multiple boards support using the same code. Do not enable.

adminip.title: Sysadmin IP
adminip.desc: The IP entered here is automatically sysadminned.

mmdeath.title: Doom timer
mmdeath.desc: Sets the expiration date for the Doom Timer. This won't have any effect as the timer setup code was disabled.

rainbownames.title: Always use rainbow usernames
rainbownames.desc: Always uses the rainbow name color effect for user names. Not really meant to be set directly, as it's meant to be used conditionally.

superadmin.title: Super Admin
superadmin.desc: Do not enable. Meant to be used conditionally.

smallbrowse.title: Force mobile mode
smallbrowse.desc: Do not enable. Meant to be set conditionally after detecting a mobile browser.
